General.Name: Casa Minerals Inc
General.Description: Casa Minerals Inc. engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in North America. The company primarily explores for gold, zinc, copper, silver, and molybdenum. It focuses on the exploration of the Pitman property comprising 15 mineral claims located in British Columbia. The company also holds 90% interests in the Congress Mine comprising 14 patented mineral claims totalling 260 acres and contiguous 25 mineral claims totalling 494.48 acres. In addition, it intends to explore Arsenault Property, as well as Keaper Property comprising one mineral claim consisting of an area of 1,877 hectares. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 470 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1V5
